[`maxHorizontalPixels`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplayscalerinformation/1505378-maxhorizontalpixels)Maximum number of horizontal source pixels (horizontalScaled).[`maxVerticalPixels`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplayscalerinformation/1505468-maxverticalpixels)Maximum number of vertical source pixels (verticalScaled).[`scalerFeatures`](/documentation/iokit/iodisplayscalerinformation/1505798-scalerfeatures)Mask of scaling features.
